step.datasource: SELECT MAX(CASE WHEN r.id IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END) as doQuit FROM (VALUES (0)) l(v) LEFT JOIN dbo._AB_Entity_Log r WITH (NOLOCK) ON r.jobid = %jobid% AND r.runid <> '%runid%' AND r.syscreated > DATEADD(HOUR, -2, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) -- check for max 2 hours back AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM dbo._AB_Entity_Log r1 WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE r1.runid = r.runid AND r1.seqno = -10) -- -10 is 'Finished Running Job'

INSERT INTO [ProdGlobe_live].[dbo].[_ST_PRD_Process_Cummulative] ( [ProductionOrder] ,[Itemcode] ,[QtyPlanned] ,[QtyReceived] ,[QtyReady] ,[QtyReject] ,[OrderStatus] ,[Quantity], [RunId] )
SELECT TOP 100 PERCENT ep.ProductionOrder, ep.Itemcode, ep.ExactPlanned, ISNULL(er.ExactReceived,0) as QtyReceived, ISNULL(pr.ProductionReady,0) as QtyReady, ISNULL(px.ProductionReject,0) as QtyReject, ISNULL(pr.OrderStatus,0) as OrderStatus, CASE WHEN ISNULL(pr.OrderStatus,0) = 1 THEN ISNULL(pr.ProductionReady,0) + ISNULL(px.ProductionReject,0) - ISNULL(er.ExactReceived,0) ELSE ISNULL(pr.ProductionReady,0) - ISNULL(er.ExactReceived,0) END as Quantity, '%runid%' as runid from [ExactData].[dbo].[_ST_PRD_Exact_Planned_Open] ep left join [ExactData].[dbo].[_ST_PRD_Exact_Received_Open] er on ep.ProductionOrder = er.ProductionOrder left join [ExactData].[dbo].[_ST_PRD_Prod_Ready] pr on ep.ProductionOrder = pr.ProductionOrder left join [ExactData].[dbo].[_ST_PRD_Prod_Reject] px on ep.ProductionOrder = px.ProductionOrder where ep.itemcode in ('1003030', '1003050') AND CASE WHEN ISNULL(pr.OrderStatus,0) = 1 THEN ISNULL(pr.ProductionReady,0) + ISNULL(px.ProductionReject,0) - ISNULL(er.ExactReceived,0) ELSE ISNULL(pr.ProductionReady,0) - ISNULL(er.ExactReceived,0) END > 0 AND ep.ProductionOrder NOT IN (SELECT ProductionOrder collate database_Default FROM [ProdGlobe_live].[dbo].[_ST_PRD_Process_Cummulative] WHERE Status < 2) ORDER BY ep.ProductionOrder

step.stepname: Check for new records productie ontvangst
--Delete double Serialnumber inconsistency of sync production system

step.datasource:
--Optimized query: SELECT DISTINCT * FROM ( SELECT TOP 999 CONCAT(FORMAT(GETDATE(), 'yyyyMMddHHmm'), FORMAT(ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY (SELECT NULL)), '000')) AS UniqueID, CASE WHEN gbk.BlockItem = 1 THEN 0 ELSE gbk.ID END as ID, ob.Productieorder as HeaderID, ob.artikel as artcode, ob.Productieorder as Project, ob.Serienummer as facode, 'Receipt by ABEI' as YourRef, ISNULL(SUM(ob.aantal), 1) as actualquantity, 10152 as res_id, gbk.magcode as warehouse FROM [ProdGlobe_live].dbo._AB_GerProd_proces as ob with (nolock) CROSS APPLY ( SELECT TOP 1 g.id, g.blockitem, pr.magcode FROM [400].dbo.PRProject as pr with (nolock) INNER JOIN [400].dbo.gbkmut as g with (nolock) ON g.project = pr.ProjectNr INNER JOIN [400].dbo.Items as i with (nolock) ON i.itemcode = g.artcode AND i.GLAccountDistribution = g.reknr WHERE pr.type = 'P' AND pr.status = 'A' AND g.transsubtype = 'A' AND g.transtype = 'B' AND g.freefield1 = 'P' AND i.IsBatchItem = 0 AND g.artcode = ob.Artikel COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT AND pr.projectnr = ob.Productieorder COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT ORDER BY g.blockitem, g.ID ASC, pr.projectnr, i.itemcode ) as gbk WHERE ISNULL(ob.productieorder, '') <> '' AND (ob.Status_ProdGer = 0 OR (ob.Status_ProdGer = 4 AND ob.Imp_attempts < 5)) GROUP BY gbk.BlockItem, gbk.ID, ob.Productieorder, ob.artikel, ob.Serienummer, gbk.magcode ORDER BY ob.Productieorder, ob.Serienummer, gbk.BlockItem, gbk.ID, ob.artikel, gbk.magcode ) SUB
--Original Query Below:
--SELECT DISTINCT TOP 1000 -- CASE WHEN gbk.BlockItem = 1 THEN 0 ELSE gbk.ID END as ID -- , ob.Productieorder as HeaderID -- , ob.Productieorder as Project -- -- , 'Receipt by ABEI' as YourRef -- , ob.artikel as artcode -- , isnull(SUM(ob.aantal), 1) as actualquantity -- , ob.Serienummer as facode -- , 10152 as res_id -- , gbk.magcode as warehouse -- -- --FROM [ProdGlobe_live].dbo._AB_GerProd_proces as ob with (nolock) -- CROSS APPLY (SELECT TOP 1 g.id, g.blockitem, pr.magcode -- FROM [400].dbo.PRProject as pr with (nolock) -- INNER JOIN [400].dbo.gbkmut as g with (NOLOCK) on g.project = pr.ProjectNr -- INNER JOIN [400].dbo.Items as i WITH (NOLOCK) on i.itemcode = g.artcode and i.GLAccountDistribution = g.reknr -- -- WHERE 1=1 -- and pr.type = 'P' -- AND pr.status = 'A' -- AND g.transsubtype = 'A' -- AND g.transtype = 'B' -- AND g.freefield1 = 'P' -- AND i.IsBatchItem = 0 -- AND g.artcode = ob.Artikel COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT -- AND pr.projectnr = ob.Productieorder COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT -- -- ORDER BY g.blockitem, g.ID ASC -- ) as gbk --where ---- (ob.Serienummer IS NULL OR ob.Serienummer not in (select top 100 percent number FROM [400].[dbo].[ItemNumbers] WITH (NOLOCK) )) LS 2020-2-26 05.048.511 -- isnull(ob.productieorder,'') <> '' --and (ob.Status_ProdGer = 0 OR (ob.Status_ProdGer = 4 and ob.Imp_attempts < 5)) ----and ob.proddatum = CONVERT(DATE, GETDATE()) -- --GROUP BY gbk.BlockItem , gbk.ID -- , ob.Productieorder -- , ob.Productieorder -- , ob.artikel -- , ob.Serienummer -- , gbk.magcode

update [ProdGlobe_live].dbo._AB_GerProd_proces with(rowlock,nowait) set Status_ProdGer = '1' where Status_prodger = '0' or (Status_ProdGer = '4' and Imp_attempts <5)
update [ProdGlobe_live].[dbo].[_ST_PRD_Process_Cummulative] Set Status = 2 WHERE runid = '%runid%'
exec [ProdGlobe_live].dbo._AB_sp_Report_Status_Prod

select distinct artikel as artcode, '95' as magcode from [ProdGlobe_live].dbo._AB_Interfiliaal_proces aip with (nolock) where 1=1 and not exists (select 1 from [%abeitargetdb%].dbo.voorrd vrd with (nolock) where vrd.magcode = '95' and vrd.artcode = aip.artikel) and ((aip.Productieorder is not null and aip.productieorder <>'' and aip.Status_Interfiliaal = '0') or (aip.Productieorder is not null and aip.Productieorder <>'' and aip.Status_Interfiliaal = '4' and aip.Imp_attempts <3))

select ID as HeaderID --Productieorder as HeaderID --, 'N' as TransType ,'G' as TransSubType ,'B' as Regelcode ,'100' as TransactionType ,proddatum As 'Datum' ,vrrdrek as Reknr ,'Productieorder: '+ productieorder As oms25 ,'600' As kstplcode ,Artikel AS artcode
,Serienummer AS facode
,'95' As warehouse ,'REWORK' As project ,ISNULL(Aantal,1) as aantal ,cast(ISNULL(Aantal,1) * CostPriceStandard as numeric (18,3)) as bdr_hfl ,proddatum As 'docdate' --proddatum As 'ReportDate' ,rtrim(ltrim(eenheid)) as UnitCode from [ProdGlobe_live].dbo._AB_Interfiliaal_proces with (nolock) where 1=1 and (Productieorder is not null and productieorder <>'' and Status_Interfiliaal = '0') or (Productieorder is not null and Productieorder <>'' and Status_Interfiliaal = '4' and Imp_attempts <3)

select ID as HeaderID --, 'N' as TransType ,'G' as TransSubType ,'B' as Regelcode ,'100' as TransactionType ,proddatum As 'Datum' ,vrrdrek as Reknr ,'Productieorder: '+ productieorder As oms25 ,'600' As kstplcode ,Artikel AS artcode
,Serienummer AS facode
,mag As warehouse ,'REWORK' As project ,ISNULL(-Aantal,-1) as aantal ,cast(ISNULL(-Aantal,-1) * CostPriceStandard as numeric (18,3)) as bdr_hfl ,proddatum As 'docdate' --proddatum As 'ReportDate' ,rtrim(ltrim(eenheid)) as UnitCode from [ProdGlobe_live].dbo._AB_Interfiliaal_proces with (nolock) where 1=1 and (Productieorder is not null and productieorder <>'' and Status_Interfiliaal = '0') or (Productieorder is not null and Productieorder <>'' and Status_Interfiliaal = '4' and Imp_attempts <3)

select ID as HeaderID, 70 as dagbknr from [ProdGlobe_live].dbo._AB_Interfiliaal_proces with (nolock) where 1=1 and (Productieorder is not null and productieorder <>'' and Status_Interfiliaal = '0') or (Productieorder is not null and Productieorder <>'' and Status_Interfiliaal = '4' and Imp_attempts <3) group by ID

update [ProdGlobe_live].dbo._AB_Interfiliaal_proces with(rowlock,nowait) set Status_Interfiliaal = '1' where Status_Interfiliaal = '0' or (Status_Interfiliaal = '4' and Imp_attempts <3)
update [ProdGlobe_live].[dbo].[_ST_PRD_Process_Cummulative] Set Status = 3 WHERE runid = '%runid%'
exec [ProdGlobe_live].dbo._AB_sp_Report_Status_Interfiliaal

SELECT [runid] ,[jobstepid] ,[Entity] ,[Property] ,[Action] ,[valueString] ,[HeaderID] ,[errormessage] ,[sequenceno] ,[syscreated] ,[RecordValue] FROM [ABEI].[dbo].[_AB_Entity_results_log] where jobid = %jobid% and runid = '%runid%' and rowstatus =-1 and Entity != 'FinancialLine'
step.contentbody:
De volgende fouten zijn opgetreden bij Productiegereedmelding en/of rework boeking

 

runid jobstepid Entity Property Action valueString HeaderID errormessage sequenceno syscreated RecordValue
%runid% %jobstepid% %Entity% %Property% %Action% %valueString% %HeaderID% %errormessage% %sequenceno% %syscreated% %RecordValue%
step.stepname: Mail failing jobsteps without financial lines

step.datasource:
INSERT INTO [ProdGlobe_live].._AB_Gerprod_Receiptless (Productieorder, Artikel, Serienummer, Proddatum, sysmessage, status) SELECT Productieorder, Artikel, Serienummer, Proddatum, sysmessage, '0' as Status FROM [ProdGlobe_live].[dbo].[_AB_GerProd_proces] with (NOLOCK) WHERE Status_ProdGer = '4' and Imp_attempts = '5' and ch_aantal IS NULL and sysmessage = 'No receipt found' and SourceId IS NOT NULL and SysCreated > Getdate() -7 ORDER BY Productieorder
DELETE FROM [ProdGlobe_live].[dbo].[_AB_GerProd_proces] WHERE Status_ProdGer = '4' and Imp_attempts = '5' and ch_aantal IS NULL and sysmessage = 'No receipt found' and SourceId IS NOT NULL and SysCreated > Getdate() -7 AND Serienummer NOT IN (SELECT Serienummer FROM [ProdGlobe_live].._AB_Gerprod_Receiptless Where status = '1')
Update [ProdGlobe_live].._AB_Gerprod_Receiptless Set status = 1 Where status = '0'
step.stepname: --Step to Delete Rows without receipt to retry

step.datasource: WITH PlannedOpen AS ( SELECT po.ProductionOrder, po.ExactPlanned FROM [ExactData].dbo.[_ST_PRD_Exact_Planned_Open] po WITH (NOLOCK) ), ReceivedOpen AS ( SELECT ro.ProductionOrder, ro.ExactReceived FROM [ExactData].dbo.[_ST_PRD_Exact_Received_Open] ro WITH (NOLOCK) ), ProductionProcess AS ( SELECT pp.ProductionOrder, pp.ProcessReady, pp.LastModified FROM [ExactData].dbo.[_ST_PRD_Prod_Process] pp WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE pp.ProductionOrder != 'PROD00198101.002' AND pp.LastModified < DATEADD(DAY, -1, GETDATE()) AND pp.LastModified > DATEADD(DAY, -182, GETDATE()) ), ProdGlobeLiveProces AS ( SELECT pg.Productieorder, COUNT(*) AS ExactPlannedCount FROM [ProdGlobe_Live].._AB_Gerprod_Proces pg WITH (NOLOCK) GROUP BY pg.Productieorder ), FilteredRows AS ( SELECT pgl.*, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY pgl.Productieorder ORDER BY (CASE WHEN pgl.aantal = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 2 END), pgl.Productieorder) AS RowNumber FROM [ProdGlobe_live].._AB_GerProd_proces pgl INNER JOIN ProductionProcess pp ON pgl.Productieorder = pp.ProductionOrder INNER JOIN PlannedOpen po ON pp.ProductionOrder = po.ProductionOrder LEFT JOIN ReceivedOpen ro ON pp.ProductionOrder = ro.ProductionOrder INNER JOIN ProdGlobeLiveProces pg ON pp.ProductionOrder = pg.Productieorder AND po.ExactPlanned = pg.ExactPlannedCount WHERE pp.ProcessReady >= po.ExactPlanned AND (ro.ExactReceived < po.ExactPlanned AND ro.ExactReceived < pp.ProcessReady) AND pgl.Serienummer IS NULL AND pgl.status_prodger = 1 ) UPDATE fr SET fr.status_prodger = 0, fr.sysmessage = 'Retry Row To Fill Up Missing Quantity' FROM FilteredRows fr WHERE fr.RowNumber = 1
step.stepname: --Step to Retry missing quantity rows for PO without Serial
